messages.speech:
The BC Emergency benefit for workers provides a one time payment of $1000 for people who have lost income.  

A one-time enhancement to the climate action tax credit will be paid in July 2020 for moderate to low-income families

More information is available here: https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/employment-business/covid-19-financial-supports?bcgovtm=20200319_GCPE_AM_COVID_4_NOTIFICATION_BCGOV_BCGOV_EN_BC__NOTIFICATION#BCEBW
